data.short_description: Category doesn’t collapse when text channels are marked as read while being in text channel in same category.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to channel in category that has many text channel unread - Make sure category is set to collapse - Mark other text channel in category as read - ObserveNote: `The reporter meant that the channels that got marked as read via long pressing a channel and then the "Mark as read" button won't disappear, not the category.`
